tasks.label: append_css
args: echo ".warning-message { display: none; margin-top: 1rem; padding: 0.75rem; background-color: #fff7ed; border: 1px solid #ffedd5; border-radius: 0.375rem; color: #9a3412; font-size: 0.875rem; } .warning-message a { text-decoration: underline; cursor: pointer; font-weight: 500; }" >> styles.css
